search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Front (front-app.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Front is: [https://front.com/pricing](https://front.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

How does Front's free trial work? Do I need a credit card?

Our free 14-day trial offers all the features available in our Growth plan. You can get started without a credit card and can upgrade at any time during your trial. You do not need a credit card to start, continue, or complete your Front trial.

Does Front offer monthly plans?

Yes, both Starter and Growth plans can be purchased month-to-month without a yearly contract.

What is a seat?

A seat is a paid Front license that can be granted to a unique user in your organization.

Do you offer any discounts for startups or non-profits?

Yes, we have discount programs for both of these groups. Eligible startups can [apply through our Front for Startups program](https://front.com/startups). [Eligible non-profits, including educational institutions](https://help.front.com/en/articles/2538), receive 50% off their annual Front plan.

Can I import my existing customer data from other help desks?

Yes, we have a [Zendesk import tool](https://help.front.com/en/articles/2203) available at no additional cost. We also recommend [Help Desk Migration](https://app.help-desk-migration.com/platforms/front) (a partner that specializes in migrations) to import your history into Front from tools like Help Scout, Freshdesk, Intercom, or Kustomer.

Is my data safe and secure?

Ensuring your data’s confidentiality, integrity, and availability is core to our mission and platform. [Read more here](https://front.com/security) about Front’s security, privacy and compliance practices.

What is the maximum amount of channels per plan?

Your channel maximum depends on both your plan and number of licenses. On Starter, you can connect up to 10 channels per license, with Growth up to 30 per license, and with Scale up to 50 per license. For example, a team of 5 users on Growth would have a maximum of 150 channels. [Please see our help article for more details](https://help.front.com/en/articles/808896).

Can I combine seats across multiple plans?

No, plans are assigned at the organization level. You can add or remove seats as needed within a single plan.

Can I pay with my bank instead of credit card?

You can pay by wire transfer or ACH if you purchase annually and the total contract value is over $15K.

Ready to deliver exceptional service with Front?

*   Request a demo
*   Try for free
